name: Sleeping Beauty Princess Diary Free - Fun Girl Talking App for iPhone & iPod Touch
name_original: Sleeping Beauty Princess Diary Free - Fun Girl Talking App for iPhone & iPod Touch
description:
Hurray, you found me! It’s me SLEEPING BEAUTY. Join me on my adventure today
Come play & talk with me, plus hear my story

INTERACT and HEAR MY STORY
I repeat back whatever you say
Hear my story about my curse, my fairy god mothers, my prince that rescues me and more -- over 100 things to say
Play with me at night, day, and morning for a totally new experience – 3 different scenes

COMPATIBILITY
Compatible with all iPod Touch, iPhone and iPad models
iPod Touch 1, 2, 3 generation owners: Your earphones must have a microphone otherwise I cannot hear you.
